scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd react-ui/ && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../react-ui && npm i && cd ../server && npm run seed
scripts.build: cd react-ui/ && npm install --only=dev && npm install  && npm run build
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix react-ui && npm run build --prefix react-ui
